department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC),
short_summary: Statistics Canada is looking to procure custom cryogenic labels to cover 6 months of operation.
description: Statistics Canada is looking to procure custom cryogenic labels to cover 6 months of operation (150,300 labels), with the option to extend the contract three additional times over the next year and a half (601,200 labels).
date_posted: They did not specify the expected date of service so we are using today's date
